Desc.entry: Part of NHS Sheffield. A large city-centre clinic housing a number of services including: Contraception and Sexual Health (SCaSH) (including a family planning/well-woman service, specialised youth clinic, psychosexual counselling, termination of pregnancy, menopause/PMS service, vasectomy service, All Clear - chlamydia screening programme, STI testing); Young People's Sexual Health Outreach Services; Adult Continence & Physiotherapy Service; Child Health and Child Health Continence Service; Podiatry; and The Mulberry Practice, a GP Practice for Asylum Seekers. Please see separate entries for details of some of these services.

Langs.entry: By arrangement at time appointment is booked
